 UIMA Workshop

The workshop took place at the GLDV 2007 spring conference in Tübingen/Germany, April 11-13, 2007. It was the first workshop of its kind and drew a large and diverse audience from across Europe. Thanks to all speakers and participants!

Please find below the workshop programme. For most talks, you can download the abstract and/or the slides.

Workshop programme

  • Workshop kick-off [slides] (Thilo Goetz)
  • Darmstadt Knowledge Processing Repository Based on UIMA [abstract, slides] (Iryna Gurevych, Max Mühlhäuser, Christof Müller, Jürgen Steimle, Markus Weimer and Torsten Zesch)
  • Processing dialogue-based data in the UIMA framework [abstract, slides] (Milan Gnjatovic, Manuela Kunze and Dietmar Rösner)
  • An UIMA-Based Tool Suite for Semantic Text Processing [abstract, slides] (Katrin Tomanek, Ekaterina Buyko and Udo Hahn)
  • An UIMA Annotation Type System for a Generic Text Mining Architecture [abstract, slides] (Udo Hahn, Ekaterina Buyko, Katrin Tomanek, Scott Piao, Yoshimasa Tsuruoka, John McNaught and Sophia Ananiadou)
  • Kookurenzberechnungen mit UIMA und Medusa (Gerhard Heyer and Marco Buechler)
  • Iterative Learning of Relation Patterns for Market Analysis with UIMA [abstract, slides] (Sebastian Blohm, Jürgen Umbrich, Philipp Cimiano and York Sure)
  • GATE and UIMA in Language Technology Teaching [abstract, slides] (Graham Wilcock)
  • Teaching "Unstructured Information Management: Theory and Applications" to Computational Linguistics Students [abstract, slides] (Iryna Gurevych, Christof Müller and Torsten Zesch)
  • A new UIMA Annotator: the Textkernel Information Extraction Engine (Alexander Kaiser and Jakub Zavrel)
  • ICE - Intelligent Content Engineering [abstract, slides] (Klaus Netter and Hannes Meyer)

Programme committee

  • Dietmar Rösner, University of Magdeburg
  • Manuela Kunze, University of Magdeburg
  • Udo Hahn, University of Jena
  • Thilo Goetz, Apache UIMA
